vulnerabilities.name: libcurl: partial password leak over DNS on HTTP redirect
vulnerabilities.overview: curl 7.62.0 through 7.70.0 is vulnerable to an information disclosure vulnerability that can lead to a partial password being leaked over the network and to the DNS server(s).
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Update curl (7.64.0-r3) to a non vulnerable version, issue fixed in 7.64.0-r4

vulnerabilities.name: sqlite: SQL injection in sqlite3ExprCodeTarget in expr.c
vulnerabilities.overview: SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles pExpr->y.pTab, as demonstrated by the TK_COLUMN case in sqlite3ExprCodeTarget in expr.c.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Update sqlite-libs (3.28.0-r1) to a non vulnerable version, issue fixed in 3.28.0-r2
